snippet.title: Lords and Villeins - Early Access Launch Trailer
snippet.description:
Lords and Villeins is now available in Early Access!

Grow dynasties of medieval families and see them evolve and interact as you build their homes, in this lighthearted pixel art city-building strategy simulation. Expand your production chain and influence the daily lives of your villagers to craft a unique story of your settlement. 

Get the game now on:
Steam - https://store.steampowered.com/app/1287530/Lords__Villeins/
GOG - https://www.gog.com/game/lords_and_villeins
EGS -  https://www.epicgames.com/store/en-US/p/lords-and-villeins-746931

Follow us:
Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/publisher/1CEntertainment
Discord: https://discord.com/invite/1c-entertainment
Website: http://www.1cpublishing.eu/
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/1CCompany/
Twitter: https://twitter.com/1C_Company
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/1c_entertainment/

#PixelArt #LifeSim
